name: Ben Leong
content: Home BEN LEONG Associate Professor School of Computing National University of Singapore 15 Computing Drive, COM2 Building, #03-20, S(117418) Tel: (+65) 6516 4240 Fax: (+65) 6779 4580 Email: benleong at comp.nus.edu.sg I am an Associate Professor of Computer Science at the School of Computing, National University of Singapore (NUS).Â  I received my Ph.D., M.Eng. and S.B. degrees from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 2006, 1997 and 1997 respectively. My research interests are in the areas of computer networking and distributed systems: Computer Networking Internet Measurements QUIC Rate-based Low Latency TCP Software Defined Networks (P4) Cellular Networks Sensor Networks Wireless Mesh Networks Distributed Systems Organization, Architecture and Programming Models Overlay Networks Networked Games My research group is always on the lookout for good interns and potential PhD students. Interested students, please send me an email with your latest resume.
